sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act shall be known and may be cited as the
Degradable Plastic Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act, the following terms shall
sections.text: have the meanings indicated, unless the context otherwise requires:

sections.heading: State purchasing.
sections.text:
The Department of Central Management
Services, and all other departments and agencies of State government, when
purchasing plastic containers and other plastic products, shall purchase
products that are degradable or recyclable whenever such products are
available at reasonable cost and in the appropriate quantity and quality.
